column4: hello guys, i live in a foresaken place called greece, and all I want in my life is 10-20 shinny ubuntu stickers for my machines :/ so far the solutions I found are way too expensive (50euros for 100 stickers - including transport) any sugestions?
buy some avery labels, make them yourself
my country isn't listed in system76... neither is any other country that i have a friend :s
